description: DaemonSet represents the configuration of a daemon set.

status.description: Status is the current status of this daemon set. This data may be out of date by some window of time. Populated by the system. Read-only. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/devel/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status

spec.description: Spec defines the desired behavior of this daemon set. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/devel/api-conventions.md#spec-and-status
